item.title: Vue Todo List
item.description: todolist功能开发 <!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="en"> <head> <meta charset="UTF-8"> <title>Vue 101</title> <script src="./vue.js"></script> </head> <body> <div id="root"> <div> <input v-model="inputValue"/> <button @click="handleSubmit">submit</button> </div> <ul> <li v-for="(item, index) of list" :key="index"> {{item}} </li> </ul> </div> <script> new Vue({ el: "#root", data: { inputValue: 'hello', list: [] }, methods: { handleSubmit: function () { this.list.push(this.inputValue) this.inputValue = '' } } }) </script>
